meanings.definition: An apparition or double of a living person.
meanings.sent1: She was shocked to see her doppelgangers in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: The two doppelgangers looked so alike that they could be mistaken for twins.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone thought the identical twins were doppelgangers.
meanings.sent4: The reflection in the water created doppelgangers of the trees on the shore.
meanings.sent5: In the ghost story, the protagonist encounters his doppelgangers haunting the old mansion.

meanings.definition: A person who closely resembles another.
meanings.sent1: The actor found his doppelgangers among the fans waiting outside the theater.
meanings.sent2: People often mistake them for doppelgangers because of their striking similarity.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the doppelgangers accidentally wearing the same outfit.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was so strong, they were like doppelgangers in thought and action.
meanings.sent5: The detective realized the suspect had a doppelganger who committed the crime.
